COMMON.generate_password_disabled: Generate Password is disabled when the form is valid
COMMON.custom_domains_description: Strengthen connections and build trust with your own branded secret links.
COMMON.description: Keep sensitive information out of your chat logs and email. Share a secret link that is available only one time.
COMMON.secret_passphrase_hint: A word or phrase that's difficult to guess
COMMON.burn_this_secret_hint: Burning a secret will delete it before it has been read (click to confirm)
COMMON.burn_this_secret_confirm_hint: Burning a secret is permanent and cannot be undone
COMMON.error_secret: You did not provide anything to share
COMMON.careful_only_see_once: Careful: we will only show it once.
COMMON.secret_was_truncated: The message was truncated b/c it was over
COMMON.feedback_text: Share your thoughts, ideas, or experiences...
COMMON.burn_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to burn this secret? This action cannot be undone.
COMMON.burn_security_notice: Burning a secret will delete it before it has been received.
COMMON.share_link_securely: For security, share this link separately from other details.

STATUS.new_description: Secret link has been created and not yet viewed
STATUS.unread_description: Secret link has been created and has not been viewed
STATUS.viewed_description: Secret link has been opened and ready to be viewed
STATUS.received_description: Secret has been revealed to the recipient
STATUS.burned_description: Secret was manually burned before being viewed
STATUS.orphaned_description: Secret has been orphaned and will be destroyed soon
STATUS.expired_description: Secret has expired before being viewed

FEATURES.encrypted_in_transit: Encrypted in transit and at rest

INSTRUCTION.share_link_instruction: Share the link with the intended recipient
INSTRUCTION.share_passphrase_instruction: Share the passphrase separately through a secure channel
INSTRUCTION.secure_channel_instruction: Use a different secure channel to share sensitive information

homepage.tagline1: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
homepage.tagline2: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
homepage.secret_hint: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.
homepage.secret_form_more_text3: and be able to send the secret by email.
homepage.cta_subtitle: Elevate your brand and share with confidence
homepage.need_free_account: Just getting started? Send emails with a free account.

private.this_msg_is_encrypted: This message is encrypted with your passphrase.
private.only_see_once: Careful: you will only see this once.
private.created_securely: Your secret has been created securely

shared.viewed_own_secret: You have viewed your own secret. It is no longer available for anyone else.
shared.you_created_this_secret: You created this secret. If you view it, the recipient will not be able to see it.
shared.pre_reveal_default: Click the button below to reveal your secure message.
shared.post_reveal_default: Your secure message is shown below.

signup.have_an_account: Or, sign in to your account

incoming.tagline1: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
incoming.tagline2: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.

incoming.incoming_secret_placeholder: Enter any information your support representative will need (e.g. system password)
incoming.incoming_ticket_number_hint: You can find this in your email (e.g. 123456)

incomingsupport.body1: A customer has sent the following info

secretlink.subject: %s sent you a secret
secretlink.body1: We have a secret for you from
secretlink.body_tagline: If you don't know the sender or believe it to be spam, send us the details here:

welcome.subject: Verify your Onetime Secret account
welcome.body1: Welcome to Onetime Secret. We have a secret for you!
welcome.postscript2: If you did not make this request, you can safely ignore this email.
